languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно кивает и возобновляет свою речь, ее слова преисполнены боли и просьбы. Она делает шаг. Еще один. И еще. Вам начинает казаться, что рейнджер слишком уверенно делает последний шаг...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно кивает и возобновляет свою речь, ее слова преисполнены боли и просьбы. Она делает шаг. Еще один. И еще. Вам начинает казаться, что рейнджер слишком уверенно делает последний шаг...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un signe de tête discret et reprend la parole, sur un ton meurtri et suppliant. Elle avance d'un pas. Suivi d'un autre. Puis d'un autre encore. Ce dernier mouvement vous semble dangereusement confiant...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは軽く頷き、再び話し始める。その言葉には苦痛と懇願が込められていた。彼女は一歩前に出る。そしてもう一歩。そしてまた一歩。あなたはこの最後の一歩が、少し行き過ぎなように感じた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは軽く頷き、再び話し始める。その言葉には苦痛と懇願が込められていた。彼女は一歩前に出る。そしてもう一歩。そしてまた一歩。あなたはこの最後の一歩が、少し行き過ぎなように感じた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特微微点了点头，再次开了口，她的话语中充满了痛苦和恳求。她走了过去，之后又走了一步，再走一步……你觉得她最后这步可能有点太冒进了……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特微微点了点头，再次开了口，她的话语中充满了痛苦和恳求。她走了过去，之后又走了一步，再走一步……你觉得她最后这步可能有点太冒进了……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet nickt dir leicht zu und beginnt wieder zu sprechen. Ihre Worte sind voller Schmerz und Flehen. Sie tritt vor. Dann noch einen Schritt. Und noch einen. Du hast das Gefühl, dass dieser letzte Schritt etwas zu übermütig war ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet nickt dir leicht zu und beginnt wieder zu sprechen. Ihre Worte sind voller Schmerz und Flehen. Sie tritt vor. Dann noch einen Schritt. Und noch einen. Du hast das Gefühl, dass dieser letzte Schritt etwas zu übermütig war ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet asiente con la cabeza y empieza a hablar de nuevo; sus palabras están llenas de dolor y súplica. Da un paso al frente. Luego otro más. Y otro. Tienes la sensación de que con el último paso se ha confiado demasiado...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet asiente con la cabeza y empieza a hablar de nuevo; sus palabras están llenas de dolor y súplica. Da un paso al frente. Luego otro más. Y otro. Tienes la sensación de que con el último paso se ha confiado demasiado...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, başıyla hafif bir işaret yapıp acı, yakarış dolu sözcüklerle yeniden konuşmaya başlıyor. İleriye bir adım atıyor. Ardından bir adım daha atıyor. Bir tane daha. Son adımının biraz fazla öz güvenle atıldığını hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a slight nod and starts speaking again, her words filled with pain and pleading. She steps forward. Then takes another step. And another. You feel as if this last step was a little too confident...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet başıyla hafif bir işaret yapıyor ve acı ve yakarış dolu sözcüklerle yeniden konuşmaya başlıyor. İleri bir adım atıyor. Ardından bir adım daha atıyor. Bir tane daha. Attığı son adımın biraz fazla öz güvenli olduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n}
